alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 7:50AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf, Wakulla, southeastern Gadsden, Liberty, Leon and Franklin Counties through 830 AM EDT/730 AM CDT/... At 750 AM EDT/650 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles south of Greensboro to near Mexico Beach. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Midway, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Wewahitchka, Doak Campbell Stadium, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower, Wakulla Springs, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, South City and Kern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
